==Thoughts==
{{All Schemes to Know Explanation|name=Higuchi Tetsuya}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Higuchi Tetsuya:''' (I can't finish writing this. There's no way I can, no matter what I do... Might as well just take two years off.)
{{Dialogue End}}

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Higuchi Tetsuya:''' I must do whatever it takes to finish "Tales of One Hundred Youkai." I promised my readers I would &mdash; on my dignity as a youkai novel writer, no less!
:'''Higuchi Tetsuya:''' But I've told tales about tengu, and I've talked of bake-danuki... How the heck will I get to one hundred different types!? Youkai are what I need, and fresh ones, new ones!
{{Dialogue End}}
